Summary: Large red flaming orb ascent over treeline, changing to orange flame orb then changing directions and speeding across the sky as a solid orange orb before disappearing suddenly
trends: There has been one other sighting in Newton
There were no other sightings in Newton on or around November 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside to have a cigarette. We saw, what we first thought was a flare coming up from the tree line near our house. It was a large red orb flying straight up from the tree line. Then it turned and began to fly though the air parallel to our street. It was "awe-inspiring"
